Posts.Content: everhopeful wrote: I am suffering from Hand and foot syndrome as a result of Docetaxcol chemotherapy.  Has anyone else experienced this?  I am wondering if it gets better when chemotherapy stops Dx 10/18/2011, ILC, Right, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, 2/4 nodes, ER-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
